channel.title: BUbreakingSectionTwo
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUbreakingSectionTwo, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Takeaways From a Times Correspondent’s Return to Afghanistan
How Fortune 500 Europe’s C-suite execs spend their time when they’re not hard at work—from puzzle-solving to jumping rope
item.description: From mind-bending puzzles to sports, Fortune 500 Europe's C-suite execs have many interests. The common thread? It makes them better leaders, they say...

item.title: Has Russia’s Shadow Fleet Added Sabotage to Its List?
item.description: Russia has assembled a fleet of hundreds of vessels to covertly ship its oil. With so many ships at sea, the idea of using some to cause havoc may be ...

item.title: Stowaway on a Delta Seattle-Hawaii Flight Is Caught Before Takeoff
item.description: The person, who boarded the flight without a ticket, was detected as the plane was preparing to take off for Hawaii on Christmas Eve.

item.title: Kazakhstan Plane Crash Survivors Describe Chaos on Azerbaijan Airlines Flight
item.description: Flight attendants and a passenger described the moments before an Azerbaijan Airlines flight went down in Kazakhstan, killing dozens.

item.title: Donald Trump asks Supreme Court to pause looming TikTok ban so he can use his ‘dealmaking expertise’ to negotiate a resolution
item.description: Trump said the court should give him time after his Jan. 20 inauguration to “seek a negotiated resolution” of the dispute.

item.title: Takeaways From a Times Correspondent’s Return to Afghanistan
What We Know About the Ship Finland Seized Over Fears of Russian Sabotage
item.description: Finland seized an oil tanker that authorities believe might have deliberately cut vital undersea cables. Finnish authorities believe the tanker may be...

item.title: Trump just asked the Supreme Court to delay the national TikTok ban so he can weigh in on it after he takes office
item.description: Trump has reversed his position on the popular app, having tried to ban it during his first term in office.

item.title: In a Political Year, Some Deaths Spoke to the Struggles for Democracy
item.description: Among the notable figures who died in a sometimes polarizing 2024, many championed justice, equal rights and political freedom.

item.title: Has Russia’s Shadow Fleet Added Sabotage to Its List?

item.title: A massive Chinese campaign just gave Beijing unprecedented access to private texts and phone conversations for an unknown number of Americans
item.description: The Chinese government has denied responsibility for the hacking.

item.title: Elon Musk admits he takes an Ozempic-like weight-loss drug that RFK Jr. wants to restrict
item.description: Elon Musk is calling himself “Ozempic Santa.”
